statements: SELECT * FROM KinematicData;
SELECT activity_name, timestamp, position_x, position_y FROM KinematicData WHERE movement_id=1;
SELECT joint_name, timestamp, position_z FROM KinematicData WHERE activity_name='Walking' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM KinematicData WHERE position_x > 0 AND position_y < 0;
SELECT movement_id, joint_name, position_x, position_y, position_z FROM KinematicData WHERE activity_name='Running' ORDER BY position_x DESC, position_y ASC;
SELECT * FROM KinematicData WHERE activity_name = 'Running' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM KinematicData WHERE joint_name = 'Head' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT movement_id, activity_name, timestamp FROM KinematicData WHERE position_x > 0 AND position_y > 0 AND position_z > 0
SELECT AVG(position_x), MAX(position_y), MIN(position_z) FROM KinematicData WHERE activity_name = 'Jumping'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM KinematicData WHERE activity_name LIKE '%Squat%'
SELECT * FROM kinematic_data;
SELECT activity_name, acceleration_y, acceleration_x FROM kinematic_data;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM kinematic_data WHERE acceleration_z > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM person WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM person WHERE height > 170;
SELECT id, activity_name, timestamp FROM kinematic_data WHERE acceleration_x > 1.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM person WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM kinematic_data WHERE acceleration_y < 0.8 AND acceleration_z > 1.0;
SELECT first_name, last_name, height, weight FROM person ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT id, activity_name, timestamp FROM kinematic_data WHERE acceleration_x < 0.5 OR acceleration_y > 2.0 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT person_id, timestamp, position_x, position_y FROM KinematicData WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM HumanBodyInfo WHERE height > 170;
SELECT activity_name, intensity FROM PhysicalActivities WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT person_id, height, weight, gender FROM HumanBodyInfo WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY height ASC;
SELECT * FROM KinematicData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM KinematicData WHERE person_id = 1
SELECT activity_name, intensity FROM PhysicalActivities ORDER BY activity_name ASC
SELECT person_id, timestamp, position_x, position_y FROM KinematicData WHERE activity_id = 3 AND position_x > 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT height, weight FROM HumanBodyInfo WHERE gender = 'Male' AND height > 170
SELECT * FROM KinematicData kd JOIN HumanBodyInfo hbi ON kd.person_id = hbi.person_id WHERE kd.position_y < 0
SELECT * FROM BodyMovements;
SELECT movement_name, movement_description FROM BodyMovements;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participant_age FROM Participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male';
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM Activities ORDER BY activity_id DESC;
SELECT movement_name, movement_description, movement_timestamp FROM BodyMovements JOIN MovementData ON BodyMovements.movement_id = MovementData.movement_id WHERE movement_speed > 0.5;
SELECT movement_name, movement_description FROM BodyMovements;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM Participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_name, activity_description FROM Activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;

SELECT movement_name, movement_description, activity_name FROM BodyMovements JOIN MovementData ON BodyMovements.movement_id = MovementData.movement_id JOIN Activities ON MovementData.activity_id = Activities.activity_id;

SELECT participant_name, participant_age, activity_name FROM Participants JOIN MovementData ON Participants.participant_id = MovementData.participant_id JOIN Activities ON MovementData.activity_id = Activities.activity_id WHERE activity_name LIKE '%Running%';
SELECT * FROM HumanParticipants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM HumanParticipants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PhysicalActivities ORDER BY activity_duration DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_duration FROM PhysicalActivities WHERE activity_id = 2;
SELECT movement_name, movement_description FROM BodyMovements WHERE movement_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM HumanParticipants;
SELECT participant_name FROM HumanParticipants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT movement_name, movement_description FROM BodyMovements WHERE movement_id = 2;
SELECT activity_name, activity_duration FROM PhysicalActivities ORDER BY activity_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM KinematicData WHERE participant_id = 3 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
